title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 11.5 - Advertising
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง 11.5 - Advertising

State Regulations

The advertising of contracts for purchases, construction, requests for proposals, and all other advertising required by law, will be
published in the State Contract Reporter, subject to State minimum bid
thresholds, unless prior exemption is obtained from the Office of the State

Comptroller, Bureau of State Expenditures, Printing Audit Unit. Where it is
clearly to the advantage of the State, advertising will be permitted in general
technical and trade newspapers and other media, under which circumstances the
prevailing advertising rates will be allowed. One tear sheet of the
advertisement must accompany each voucher. The date or dates of publication, broadcast or number of insertions must appear on the face of the
voucher. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2ยง
11.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
